page.title: 09Population
page.content: The village with the highest population is Dunham on Trent which has about l88 adults and approximately 40 children. Newton on Trent has l55 adults and 40 childeen. North Clifton has 118 adults and 27 children,Ragnall has 80 adults and 20 children, but in Fledborough there are only 41 adults and 15 children. There appears to be an increase in the number of births, but young couples do not necessarily stay in the area because of lack of facilities for their children and few work opportunities for themselves. In all five villages the majority of adults over 18 vote conservative.
